entry.title: Life Is Short Rock It Leggings
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printful
Type: Leggings
Price: 34.99

Whatever it is that you do or want to be doing, whether it's working out, running a successful business, or jamming up on stage to a crowd of screaming fans, you have to stop dreaming about it and start doing it. There's no time to waste. Life is short. Rock it.

Stylish, durable, and a hot fashion staple. These polyester/spandex leggings are made of a comfortable microfiber yarn, and they'll never lose their stretch. 

• Fabric is 82% polyester, 18% spandex 
• Four-way stretch
• Elastic waistband
• Precision-cut and hand-sewn after printing

Size guide

  XS S M L XL
Waist (inches) 25 28 30 35 37
Hips (inches) 35 38 41 45 49
Inseam length (inches) 26 ¼ 26 ¾ 27 ⅛ 27 ½ 27 ⅞

entry.title: Cupid's Guitar Kid's Leggings
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printful
Type: Leggings
Price: 24.99

These soft polyester/spandex kids leggings are just perfect for active kiddos. Graphics are sublimation printed, so they'll never lose the color intensity (which is great for running around and getting messy).

• Fabric: 82% polyester/18% spandex
• Made with a smooth and comfortable microfiber yarn
• Material has a four-way stretch, so fabric stretches and recovers on the cross and lengthwise grains
• Sewn with an overlock and coverstitch finish
• Vibrant colors that won't fade
• Medium/raised elastic waistband
• Precision-cut and hand-sewn after printing

Size guide

  2T (1-2YR) 4T (2-3YR) 5 (3-4YR) 6 (5-6YR) 6X (6-7YR)
Height (inches) 36 ¼ 37 ¾ 40 ⅞ 44 47 ¼
Legging length (inches) 17 19 ½ 23 26 ¼ 28 ½

entry.summary:
Vendor: Printful
Type: Leggings

entry.title: Rock Paper Scissors
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printful
Type: T-Shirts
Price: 24.99 - 26.99 (12 variants)

Rock Paper Scissors has never sounded so good. It's true, your opponent is going to quickly figure out that you're throwing rock every time, but it will totally be worth it.

Men:

This design is printed on the Anvil 980 Lightweight Fashion Short Sleeve T-Shirt

  • 100% ring-spun lightweight cotton

  • Pre-shrunk

  • Tubular construction

  • Shoulder-to-shoulder tape

  • Seamless collar

  • Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem

This is a classic tee that has a light feel. Made of 100% ring-spun cotton (except for heather colors, which contain 10% polyester). 

Women:

This design is printed on the Next Level 3900 Ladies' the Boyfriend Tee

  • 100% combed ring-spun cotton

  • Heather Grey is 90/10 cotton/polyester

  • 32 singles thread weight

  • Fabric laundered

  • Set-in 1x1 baby rib collar

  • Longer body length

  • Slimmer fit

  • Tear away label

  • Fabric weight 4.3 oz.

A signature style from Next Level, this super-soft boyfriend tee is instantly loved by all who wear it.


DESIGNED BY JEFF GARRIS (Owner)

entry.title: Howling Werewolf Electric Guitar T-Shirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printful
Type: T-Shirts
Price: 24.99 - 26.99 (12 variants)

Electric guitar is a totally different beast than acoustic. I don't know about you, but when I bend that note just right I feel like howling. Don't hold back anymore, let out your inner animal! Forget about kitty cats and monkeys, let the world know what your real spirit animal is... a howling werewolf. Correction, a badass, guitar playing, howling werewolf.

entry.title: Groupies Wanted T-Shirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printful
Type: T-Shirts
Price: 24.99 - 26.99 (12 variants)

A fan is a fan is a fan, but a groupie... now there's someone special. And a group of groupies is even better. These are the real fans. They follow you from show to show, they spread the word about your band, and they remind you of why you love getting up on stage to play guitar.

As outgoing as these super fans might seem, sometimes they can be quite shy and need a little hint. Let them know that you're in the market for some groupies by wearing this original Groupies Wanted t-shirt.
